#LeadershipOfChange 
#ChangeManagementSponsorship
Engage the organisation
The sponsor’s role is to ensure that every level of the organisation impacted by the change has been engaged from top to bottom with no vacuums
#ChangeManagement
https://t.co/TznGjAcRQy https://t.co/ls5FzkYzL0

#LeadershipOfChange 
#ChangeManagementSponsorship
Ensure resources are released
The sponsor should ensure the leaders release quality resources from normal day-to-day operations to the change programme as promised
#ChangeManagement
https://t.co/TznGjAcRQy https://t.co/iKETenLAHV

#LeadershipOfChange 
#ChangeManagementSponsorship
Communicate Constantly
Change sponsor communication is about getting the right message, to the right stakeholders at the right time, in their frame of reference with a feedback loop#ChangeManagement
https://t.co/TznGjAdpG6 https://t.co/fUzktJMlrv
